allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Establish proper main/gh-pages workflow

- Remove docs/ from main branch (build artifacts)
- Add /docs/ to .gitignore on main branch
- Update date to use last-modified instead of hardcoded date
- Flatten Chapter 7 structure for sequential numbering
- Clean up build artifacts (index.tex, index_files/)
- Add sr_demo001.png image

Main branch now contains source files only.
Rendered output should be tracked on gh-pages branch.
EOF
)")
